[Antagonize](/Feats.aspx?ID=6136) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=825" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 165 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Pirate](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=258) (Level 4)

</column>

---

Your taunts and threats earn your foes' ire. When you successfully [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=2395) a creature, its [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76) condition can't decrease to less than 1 at the end of its turn until it either uses a [hostile action](/Rules.aspx?ID=300) against you or can no longer observe or sense you for at least 1 round.
